segments.text: And these shortsighted exceptions ... They aren't even worth being made a topic for the meeting.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그리고 이런 근시안적인 예외들은... 회의 안건으로 삼을 가치조차 없다.

segments.text: Yet ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 하지만...

segments.text: They're not here for the St. Pavlov Foundation.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이들은 성 파블로프 재단 때문에 온 것이 아닙니다.

segments.text: They're here for Vertin. They choose to follow her out of their own will, because of their admiration for her.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그들은 버틴을 위해 여기 있는 거야. 그녀에 대한 존경심 때문에 자신들의 의지로 그녀를 따르기로 선택한 거지.

segments.text: That is the essential difference between them and our former recruits.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 우리가 기존에 모집했던 직원들과 근본적으로 다른 부분이죠.

segments.text: You mean ... it's not important at all for them to join the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 그러니까... 그들이 재단에 합류하는 것은 전혀 중요하지 않다는 뜻이군요.

segments.text: I'm afraid so.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그런 것 같습니다.

segments.text: But we can't expel them.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 하지만 우리도 그들을 쫓아낼 순 없습니다.

segments.text: We both know that the Foundation now requires new members to form a stronger force.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 현재의 재단이 더 강력한 세력을 구축하려면, 새로운 구성원의 참여가 시급하다는 것은 다들 잘 알고 있습니다.

segments.text: What are you trying to say, Ms. Z? Skip to the point.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: Z씨, 무슨 말을 하려는 거요? 요점만 말해보시오.

segments.text: She returns to her seat, sits down, and opens the folder again.
segments.translation: 그녀는 다시 자리로 돌아와 앉더니 서류철을 다시 펼쳤다.

segments.text: Today, the House of Integratus has resubmitted the revised draft of Storm Reformation: Manpower and Discipline.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 오늘 융합원에서 폭풍우 개혁안: 인력과 규율 수정 초안을 재제출했어.

segments.text: I think it's time to decide if this draft can be adopted and then start the debate.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이 초안을 통과시켜 입법 변론 단계로 올려보낼지 검토할 필요가 있다고 생각합니다.

segments.text: You're asking for troubles, madam ...
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 부인, 괜한 문제를 자초하고 계시는군요...

segments.text: Please turn to page 21, section 3.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 21쪽 3번째 문단을 봐주십시오.

segments.text: "External personnel recruited by the Timekeeper should be placed within the Timekeeper's department."
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 타임키퍼가 모집한 외부인은 타임키퍼의 편제에 귀속된다

segments.text: "The Timekeeper has the duties of education and discipline to them and should be responsible for their follow-up behaviors."
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 타임키퍼는 통일된 훈련과 관리를 제공하고, 그들의 이후 행동에 대해 책임진다.

segments.text: "Personnel within the Timekeeper's department, subject to the Foundation's Staff Code, will take orders from the Timekeeper and are not required to take direct orders from the Foundation."
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 타임키퍼 부서 소속 직원들은 재단의 직원 규정에 따라 타임키퍼의 명령을 받으며, 재단으로부터 직접적인 명령을 받을 의무는 없다.

segments.text: This section allows those unregistered arcanists to have more autonomy and develop a stronger sense of identity as a part of the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이 문단은 미등록 마도학자들에게 더 높은 수준의 자율권을 부여하고, 재단에 대한 소속감을 강화할 것입니다.

segments.text: Meanwhile, by giving orders to the Timekeeper, the Foundation still has the military right to deploy them.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 마찬가지로 재단은 타임키퍼를 통해 이들을 동원 및 배치할 군사적 권리를 유지하게 됩니다.

segments.text: It can solve the current problem.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 현재의 문제를 해결할 수 있습니다.

segments.text: Which means we'll be working with some uncontrollable mercenaries.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그러면 통제 불가능한 용병들과 함께 일해야 한다는 뜻이군.

segments.text: I'll say it's the reserve service for wartime.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 전 유사시의 예비역이라고 생각합니다.

segments.text: It's not going to work. What happened when the arcanists were not under control?
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그런 식으로는 안 될 거야. 마도술사들이 통제되지 않았을 때 무슨 일이 일어났는지 기억 안 나?

segments.text: Massacres, tyranny, endless revenge ... History is nothing but a sewer to them, where they vent their excessive energy and deceive those in power with a speech of ignorance.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 학살, 폭정, 끝없는 복수... 역사란 그들에게는 그저 과도한 에너지를 분출하고 무지한 말로 권력자들을 기만하는 하수구에 불과하지.

segments.text: The reality has proven that.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 현실이 그것을 증명했습니다.

segments.text: Exactly. What's more, there has never been a reform as such in the history of the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 맞습니다. 게다가 재단 역사상 이런 개혁은 전례가 없었습니다.

segments.text: During the unexpected "Storm," reforming in a rush will only increase the ri- ...
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 예상치 못한 폭풍우 상황에서 성급하게 개혁을 추진하면 위험만 증가할 뿐이...

segments.text: Sorry for being late.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 늦어서 미안해.

segments.text: Constantine strides into the meeting room, throwing her folder on the table.
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴이 회의실 안으로 성큼성큼 들어오더니 서류철을 테이블 위로 던졌다.

segments.text: Quite a heated discussion.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 꽤 열띤 토론이었네.

segments.text: I can see you all have a great interest in this draft proposal.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 여러분 모두 이 초안 제안서에 큰 관심을 보이고 계시는군요.

segments.text: Hope I didn't miss too much.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 너무 많이 놓치지 않았길 바라는데.

segments.text: We are on page 21, section 3.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 21페이지 3항목입니다.

segments.text: Ms. Z insists on adopting this draft.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: Z씨가 이 초안을 채택하겠다고 고집을 부리고 있습니다.

segments.text: Ms. Z, please walk Madam Constantine through this section.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: Committee Member Ⅰ: "Z씨, 콘스탄틴 부인께 이 부분을 안내해 드리세요.

segments.text: No need for that. I have read the stenographer's report.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그럴 필요 없어. 속기사 보고서는 이미 읽어봤거든.

segments.text: In fact, this is the second time I'm addressing this proposal. Considering the Integratus has been very determined to its submission, I believe many delegates must have a burning interest in the case.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 사실, 이 안건을 다루는 것은 이번이 두 번째입니다. 인테그라투스가 이 제안서 제출에 매우 강한 의지를 보이고 있는 것을 고려할 때, 많은 대표단들이 이 사안에 뜨거운 관심을 가지고 있을 것이라고 생각합니다.

segments.text: At least it's worth some discussions.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 최소한 논의해볼 가치는 있겠군.

segments.text: Pedra, why do you oppose it?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 페드라, 왜 반대하는 거야?

segments.text: The rise of Manus Vindictae has caused the arcanum world to gradually break free from the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 재건의 손의 부상으로 마도술계가 점차 재단으로부터 벗어나고 있습니다.

segments.text: Therefore we need to monitor what our arcanists think and control what they do in a stricter manner, in case they go too far.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 따라서 우리는 마도술사들이 무엇을 생각하는지 감시하고 그들의 행동을 더욱 엄격하게 통제해야 합니다. 그들이 선을 넘지 않도록 말이죠.

segments.text: Manus Vindictae has a subversive slogan. Their influence has been getting bigger since the first "Storm," so has the scale of their infiltration.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: Committee Member Ⅰ: 재건의 손은 전복적인 슬로건을 내세우고 있습니다. 첫 번째 폭풍우 이후로 그들의 영향력이 커지고 있고, 침투 규모도 마찬가지입니다.

segments.text: In The Walden incident in 1929, we were given away in advance. It probably had something to do with the infiltration.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 1929년 월든 사건에서 우리는 미리 발각당했지. 아마 침투와 관련이 있었을 거야.

segments.text: Very well, a point worth discussion.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 좋아, 논의해볼 만한 지적이군.

segments.text: But it is not relevant to our subject here and now.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 하지만 그건 지금 여기서 우리가 다룰 주제와는 관련이 없어.

segments.text: Stenographer, please take down the point Mr. Rosa just made. That will be the subject of our meeting in the third week.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 속기사, 로사 씨가 방금 말한 요점을 기록해 주세요. 그것이 3주차 회의 안건이 될 겁니다.

segments.text: Katz, what do you think?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 카츠, 어떻게 생각해?

segments.text: The expectations of our constituencies are on our shoulders.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 위원회 위원 Ⅱ: 우리 지지층들의 기대가 우리 어깨에 달려 있습니다.

segments.text: Fear of the arcanists has grown due to the attacks by Manus Vindictae in many regions.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 여러 지역에서 발생한 재건의 손의 공격으로 인해 마도사들에 대한 공포가 커지고 있습니다.

segments.text: It's not ideal for us to implement the "Peace Policy" and promote the arcane technology.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 평화 정책을 시행하면서 마도술 기술을 발전시키는 것은 우리에게 이상적이지 않습니다.

segments.text: To maintain the Foundation's reputation, we have to start with the registered arcanists. Strengthen the regulations, and show the public that arcanists are reasonable and trustworthy.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 재단의 명성을 지키기 위해서는 등록된 마도술사들부터 시작해야 합니다. 규제를 강화하고, 마도술사들이 합리적이고 신뢰할 수 있는 존재라는 것을 대중에게 보여줘야 해요.

segments.text: That is why I am opposed to the draft.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 그래서 나는 그 초안에 반대하는 것이다.

segments.text: ... Inspiring.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: ... 감동적이군.

segments.text: She stands up, pacing around in the meeting room.
segments.translation: 그녀가 자리에서 일어나 회의실 안을 이리저리 거닐었다.

segments.text: However, what a shame, none of you have realized the key factor in this subject.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 하지만 안타깝게도, 너희들은 아무도 이 문제의 핵심 요소를 깨닫지 못했군.

segments.text: What is the key element that decides whether this proposal will be approved or not?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이 제안이 승인될지 말지를 결정하는 핵심 요소가 뭐지?

segments.text: Manus Vindictae?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 재건의 손?

segments.text: The constituents?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 구성 요소들?

segments.text: No. It's far simpler than those.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 아니야. 그런 것들보다 훨씬 간단해.

segments.text: It's Vertin.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 버틴이야.

segments.text: According to the proposal, Vertin will become the only tie between these unregistered arcanists and the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 제안서에 따르면, 버틴이 미등록 마도술사들과 재단 사이의 유일한 연결고리가 될 것입니다.

segments.text: As the number of Vertin's field missions increases, she will inevitably get in touch with more and more unregistered arcanists.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 버틸의 현장 임무가 늘어날수록, 그녀는 필연적으로 더 많은 미등록 마도술사들과 접촉하게 될 것이다.

segments.text: That is to say, outside the Foundation's jurisdiction, a group of people is getting stronger each day—an armed force.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 즉, 재단의 관할권 밖에서 한 무리의 사람들이 날마다 강해지고 있다는 뜻이지—무장 세력 말이야.

segments.text: Her attitude towards the Foundation will be the key to all the issues.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 재단에 대한 그녀의 태도가 모든 문제의 열쇠가 될 거야.

segments.text: Vertin received her education in SPDM from an early age. She has a clear tendency.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 어릴 때부터 재단의 제1 방어선 학교에서 교육받은 만큼, 버틴의 성향은 매우 뚜렷합니다.

segments.text: Yes, that's what I think.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 네, 제가 생각하는 바가 그렇습니다.

segments.text: That's also why I have asked someone who can provide a valid argument on the issue to join us.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그래서 이 문제에 대해 타당한 논거를 제시할 수 있는 사람에게 우리와 함께해 달라고 부탁한 것이기도 하고.

segments.text: You may come in, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 들어와도 좋다, 소네트.

segments.text: The door is pushed ajar.
segments.translation: 문이 밀리더니 작은 틈이 보였다.

segments.text: Sonetto enters the room, humbly and prudently. Her uniform seems to have changed a little.
segments.translation: 소네트가 겸손하고 신중한 모습으로 방에 들어왔다. 그녀의 제복이 조금 바뀐 것 같았다.

segments.text: ... Good day, Madam Vice President. Greetings to all committee members. May the peace be with us.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 안녕하세요, 부회장님. 위원회 여러분께 인사드립니다. 평화가 우리와 함께하길.

segments.text: The Timekeeper is still in treatment. Before she is restored to health, I appoint you to take care of all the relevant matters on her behalf.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 타임키퍼는 아직 치료 중이다. 그녀가 건강을 회복하기 전까지, 자네가 그녀를 대신해서 모든 관련 업무를 처리하도록 임명하겠다.

segments.text: Copy that.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 알겠습니다.

segments.text: Now, I will ask you some questions. Please answer them truthfully.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이제 몇 가지 질문을 하겠습니다. 솔직하게 답해 주세요.

segments.text: Clear.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 알겠습니다.

segments.text: Based on your observation, do you or do you not think the Timekeeper has been loyal to the Foundation?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 당신이 관찰한 바로는, 타임키퍼가 재단에 충성했다고 생각하나, 아니면 그렇지 않다고 생각하나?

segments.text: Of, of course!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 무, 물론입니다!

segments.text: All the students of the School of Primary Defense of Mankind are devoted to the peace of mankind. We have pledged lifelong allegiance to the Foundation that leads the cause.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제1 방어선 학교의 생도들 모두 인류 평화를 위해 헌신하며, 대업을 이끄는 재단에 평생 충성하기로 맹세했습니다.

segments.text: Heh heh, that's not what I'm asking.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 헤헤, 내가 묻고 있는 건 그게 아니야.

segments.text: Let's put it differently. Why do you think Vertin would provoke other students to rebel when she was in school?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 다르게 표현해보자. 버틴이 학교에 다닐 때 왜 다른 학생들을 선동해서 반란을 일으키려 했다고 생각해?

segments.text: I ... I do not know ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전... 모르겠습니다...

segments.text: I am sorry.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 죄송합니다.

segments.text: After the incident of the "Storm," why would Vertin show reluctance to invite the unregistered arcanists to join the Foundation?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 폭풍우 사건 이후, 버틴은 왜 미등록 마도술사들을 재단에 초대하는 것을 꺼리는 걸까?

segments.text: Because ... Emm ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 왜냐하면... 음...

segments.text: At one point in her negotiation with the Manus Vindictae, Vertin has agreed to join them. What do you think her true intention was?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 재건의 손과의 협상에서 버틴이 그들에게 합류하기로 동의한 적이 있었지. 그녀의 진짜 의도가 뭐였다고 생각해?

segments.text: That'll be enough. I believe we all have our answers by now.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이제 충분해. 우리 모두 답을 얻었을 거야.

segments.text: Madam Vice President! A-According to our investigation of the event in 1929 and Timekeeper's report, it is highly possible that Arcana of Manus Vindictae has the arcane power to influence the sanity and consciousness of others from a certain distance.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 부회장님! 저, 저희가 1929년 사건과 타임키퍼의 보고서를 조사한 결과, 재건의 손의 아르카나가 일정 거리에서 타인의 정신과 의식에 영향을 미치는 마도술을 보유하고 있을 가능성이 매우 높습니다.

segments.text: She is able to exert an irresistible psychic influence on others through short conversations. Timekeeper ... Timekeeper was under huge threats at that time.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아르카나는 간단한 대화만으로 타인에게 저항하기 힘든 정신적 영향을 끼칩니다. 타임키퍼... 타임키퍼에게 그때 엄청난 위협이 가해졌어요.

segments.text: I think all of her responses were out of her survival instinct.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전 당시 버틴의 모든 대답은 자력 구제 본능에서 비롯된 거라고 생각합니다.

segments.text: This is also one of the survival strategies that have been taught in Chapter 1, Book 3 of Introduction to Strategy edited by the School of Primary Defense of Mankind.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이것도 인류 제1 방어선 학교에서 편찬한 전략학 개론 3권 1장에서 가르치는 생존 전략 중 하나입니다.

segments.text: I see. You may leave the room now.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 알겠다. 이제 나가도 좋다.

segments.text: Sonetto's eyes turn red.
segments.translation: 소네트의 눈가가 빨갰다.

segments.text: We appreciate the information you just added. You have always been an excellent student. We are very proud of you.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 방금 추가해준 정보에 감사드립니다. 당신은 언제나 훌륭한 학생이었어요. 우리는 당신이 매우 자랑스럽습니다.

segments.text: Now it's time to leave and rest.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이제 떠나서 쉴 시간이야.

segments.text: ... Copy that.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...알겠습니다.

segments.text: She leaves the room as instructed.
segments.translation: 그녀는 지시받은 대로 방을 나섰다.

segments.text: Silence fills the room.
segments.translation: 방 안에 적막이 흘렀다.

segments.text: What a controversial issue.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 참 논란이 많은 문제군.

segments.text: What's your view on this, Ms. Z?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이것에 대해 어떻게 생각하시나요, Z씨?

segments.text: Madam Z stands up. She takes her time before speaking.
segments.translation: Z가 자리에서 일어났다. 그녀는 말하기 전 잠시 시간을 두었다.

segments.text: In my point of view ... Vertin does have doubts about current system.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 저는... 버틴이 현행 제도에 대해 의혹을 품어온 것은 분명하다고 생각합니다.

segments.text: But doubts don't mean disloyalty.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 하지만 그렇다고 해서 충성하지 않는다고 볼 순 없죠.

segments.text: In fact, if we want to further expand the staff to contend against the Manus Vindictae...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 사실, 재건의 손에 맞서기 위해 직원을 더 확충하려면...

segments.text: We need flexible management.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 융통성 있는 관리가 필요합니다.

segments.text: Apply customized standards to arcanists with different backgrounds and different training objectives.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 각기 다른 배경과 훈련 목표를 가진 마도학자들에게 맞춤형 기준을 적용하는 것입니다.

segments.text: Through this, not only can we remove the doubts of Vertin, but also ease the tension between the Foundation and other unregistered arcanists.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이를 통해 버틴의 의혹을 풀어줄 수 있을 뿐만 아니라, 재단과 다른 미등록 마도학자들 간의 긴장 관계도 완화할 수 있습니다.

segments.text: Constantine squints at her.
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴이 그녀를 눈을 가늘게 뜨고 바라본다.

segments.text: You have been very thoughtful.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 정말 세심하게 배려해 주셨군요.

segments.text: Carry it out then.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그럼 실행해.

segments.text: The stenographer pauses out of surprise.
segments.translation: 속기사가 놀라서 멈춰 섰다.

segments.text: She looks up at Constantine, seeking confirmation from the look on her face.
segments.translation: 그녀는 고개를 들어 콘스탄틴을 바라보며, 그녀의 표정에서 확신을 구하려 했다.

segments.text: The stenographer quickly regains her composure and starts typing.
segments.translation: 속기사는 금세 정신을 차린 뒤 타자기를 치기 시작했다.

segments.text: "Pass"
segments.translation: 승인 통과

segments.text: Silver divination stand, white silk, pearls soaked in night dew ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 은빛 점술대, 하얀 비단, 밤이슬에 적신 진주들...

segments.text: Hmm, what else lunar materials do I need ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 흠, 달 관련 재료로 또 뭐가 필요하지...

segments.text: Alright! Let me see how much frankincense and myrrh are left ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 좋아! 유향과 몰약이 얼마나 남았는지 확인해보자...

segments.text: Cool, just the quantity I need.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 좋아, 딱 필요한 만큼이네.

segments.text: Matilda immerses herself in the work on the desk. She checked the installment of the curtains repeatedly, making sure the moonlight will precisely shed on the orb.
segments.translation: 마틸다는 책상 위의 작업에 몰두했다. 그녀는 커튼의 설치 상태를 반복해서 확인하며, 달빛이 구체에 정확히 비추어지도록 했다.

segments.text: A low noise is growing in a vessel not far away from her.
segments.translation: 멀지 않은 곳에 있는 용기 속에서 작은 소란이 일고 있다.

segments.text: But she has no clue at all.
segments.translation: 하지만 그녀는 전혀 눈치채지 못했다.

segments.text: Okay, all set. Incense basin, my incense basin ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 좋아, 준비 완료. 향로, 내 향로...

segments.text: She turns around.
segments.translation: 그녀가 몸을 돌렸다.

segments.text: Ahhh!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 아아아!

segments.text: The incense basin falls, making a hollow sound on the Soumak.
segments.translation: 향료 접시가 떨어져 소우막 위에서 공허한 소리를 냈다.

segments.text: A pair of pointy ears emerge from behind the basin.
segments.translation: 향료 접시 뒤로 뾰족한 작은 귀가 올라왔다.

segments.text: You again! Annoying divination sprites!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 또 너희야! 성가신 점술 정령들!

segments.text: You are not stealing anything from me this time!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 이번엔 내게서 아무것도 훔쳐가지 못할 거야!

segments.text: Her attitude doesn't bother these transparent creatures at the moment.
segments.translation: 투명한 작은 생물은 마틸다가 당황하건 말건 관심이 없었다.

segments.text: Unlike any ordinary critters who always act in a group, only one or two of them are more than enough to get people in trouble.
segments.translation: 무리를 지어 행동하는 일반적인 생물들과는 달리, 이들은 한두 마리만 있어도 사람들을 곤경에 빠뜨리기에 충분하다.

segments.text: Their thin, slim hands grab hold of the edge of the silver incense basin. They are flying towards the window.
segments.translation: 요정은 가녀린 손으로 은제 향료 접시의 가장자리를 움켜쥔 채 창밖으로 날아간다.

segments.text: Hey! Where are you taking my basin?! Stop it!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 야! 내 대야 어디로 가져가는 거야?! 그만둬!

segments.text: She jumps up the windowsill and grips the other edge of the basin.
segments.translation: 마틸다는 창턱으로 뛰어올라 은접시의 다른 쪽을 꽉 붙들었다.

segments.text: Ugh ... Looks like you need a good lesson to understand why you shouldn't do this!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 으악... 왜 이런 짓을 하면 안 되는지 제대로 가르쳐줘야겠네!

segments.text: Wait and see. I'll let you know the consequence of messing with Ms. Matilda Bouanich!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 두고 봐. 마틸다 부아니치 양을 건드린 대가가 뭔지 알려줄 테니까!

segments.text: The silver basin falls to the floor, knocking a shallow crater on it.
segments.translation: 은그릇이 바닥에 떨어지더니 이가 나가버렸다.

segments.text: The sprites are crawling under the window, looking flabby and weak. Apparently, they have taken quite a shock.
segments.translation: 창밖 아래에서 정령들이 기어다니고 있었는데, 축 늘어져 있고 기력이 없어 보였다. 상당한 충격을 받은 것 같았다.

segments.text: Matilda picks up the basin and wipes out the dust.
segments.translation: 마틸다는 향료 접시를 주워 들어 위에 묻은 먼지를 닦아냈다.

segments.text: Ha, he who laughs last, laughs best! It's me, ME!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 하하, 최후에 웃는 자가 진짜 승자지! 바로 나야, 나!

segments.text: They burst out an incomprehensible curse, sneaking away from the window with drooping wings on their backs.
segments.translation: 그들은 알아들을 수 없는 욕설을 내뱉으며, 등에 달린 축 늘어진 날개를 떨구고 창가에서 몰래 도망쳤다.

segments.text: Ugh ... these troublemakers. I'm exhausted.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 으... 이 말썽꾸러기들. 정말 지쳐.

segments.text: It's kinda late ... Oh! Thank goodness, I didn't miss the high tide!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 좀 늦었네... 아! 다행이다, 만조를 놓치지 않았어!

segments.text: Hurriedly, she starts to restore the order on the desk.
segments.translation: 그녀는 허둥지둥 책상 위의 질서를 되돌리기 시작했다.

segments.text: Set the props ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 소품을 준비해...

segments.text: I can't be distracted again. Divination takes my full attention and energy ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 다시는 정신이 산만해질 수 없어. 점술에는 내 모든 집중력과 에너지가 필요하거든...

segments.text: However, there's a knock on the door.
segments.translation: 그런데 문을 두드리는 소리가 들려왔다.

segments.text: Ahem! The high tide caused by the moon is coming. Let me see, estimated to start at 20:45.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 에헴! 달이 일으키는 만조가 다가오고 있어. 어디 보자, 20시 45분경에 시작될 것으로 예상돼.

segments.text: Three minutes to go.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 3분 남았어.

segments.text: Gotta purify the orb when the high tide starts to make sure the divination is correct ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 만조가 시작되면 구슬을 정화해야 해... 점술이 정확하도록 말이야...

segments.text: The knock comes again.
segments.translation: 노크 소리가 다시 들려왔다.

segments.text: Matilda frowns.
segments.translation: 마틸다는 미간을 찌푸렸다.

segments.text: Calm down, calm down. This is the key moment ... Whoever it is, I must not be distracted!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 진정해, 진정하라고. 지금이 중요한 순간이야... 누가 와도 정신을 놓으면 안 돼!

segments.text: Alright ... Focus, focus.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 좋아... 집중해, 집중.

segments.text: Eyes closed ... Focus ... Imagine my body rising and falling alongside the tide under the blessing of the moon ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 눈을 감고... 집중해... 달의 축복 아래 조수와 함께 오르락내리락하는 내 몸을 상상해...

segments.text: And she is on the other side of the sea ... waiting for me to find her ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 그리고 그녀는 바다 저편에서... 내가 찾아주기를 기다리고 있어...

segments.text: Time to burn the incense ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 향을 피울 시간이야...

segments.text: Show yourself in the orb, Sonett- ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 구슬 속에 모습을 드러내, 소네트...

segments.text: Matilda, are you there?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 마틸다, 안에 있어?

segments.text: Wh-what is ... going on?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 뭐, 뭐가... 어떻게 된 거야?

segments.text: I am sorry, but I think I heard your voice.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 미안해, 네 목소리를 들은 것 같아서.

segments.text: I need to ask you ... a favor.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 너에게... 도움을 좀 요청하고 싶어.

segments.text: Her voice sounds different. Exhausted, almost rusty, as if it were coming out from an old cassette.
segments.translation: 그녀의 목소리가 평소와 달랐다. 지쳐있고, 거의 녹슬어버린 듯했다. 마치 오래된 카세트테이프에서 흘러나오는 소리 같았다.

segments.text: C-coming! Um, w-wait a minute!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 가-가고 있어! 음, 잠-잠깐만!

segments.text: I'm, uh, busy! W-Wait there and be patient!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 나, 어... 바빠! 잠-잠깐 거기서 기다려!

segments.text: In a great panic, she pulls up the silk, covers the orb, and sticks the both of them into a corner of the couch.
segments.translation: 그녀는 크게 당황하며 비단을 끌어올려 구슬을 덮은 다음, 둘 다 소파 구석에 밀어 넣었다.

segments.text: The door opens.
segments.translation: 문이 열렸다.

segments.text: They both stand inside the door frame, toe to toe, blocking each other's way. As they awkwardly try to move, they go up and retreat in the same direction, as if this were a tango tutorial.
segments.translation: 두 사람은 문틀 안에서 마주 서서 서로의 길을 막고 있었다. 어색하게 움직이려 하자 같은 방향으로 앞으로 나아갔다가 뒤로 물러서기를 반복했다. 마치 탱고 수업을 받는 것 같았다.

segments.text: Matilda eventually steps back and lets Sonetto in.
segments.translation: 마침내 마틸다는 소네트를 들여보내 주었다.

segments.text: Now tell me your request! Wh-what brings you to the bright and intelligent Ms. Bouanich at this time?!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 자, 이제 요청사항을 말해봐! 뭐-뭔 일로 이 시간에 똑똑하고 총명한 부아니치 양을 찾아온 거야?!

segments.text: Sonetto forces a smile on her face.
segments.translation: 소네트는 애써 미소 지었다.

segments.text: Could you please read the future for me?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 미래를 점쳐줄 수 있을까?

segments.text: Matilda sees something she has never seen before on Sonetto's face.
segments.translation: 마틸다는 소네트의 얼굴에서 여태 본 적 없는 표정을 보았다.

segments.text: They sit down by the orb.
segments.translation: 두 사람은 수정구 옆에 앉았다.

segments.text: Myrrh is quietly burning next to them.
segments.translation: 몰약이 한쪽에서 조용히 타올랐다.

segments.text: Alright. Now is a good time to ask the moon for help ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 좋아. 이제 달에게 도움을 청할 때야...

segments.text: Clean your hands in the silver pot, and put them on mine.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 은 항아리에 손을 씻고, 내 손 위에 올려놓아.

segments.text: Okay. Now sit opposite me, and gaze into the orb.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 좋아. 이제 내 맞은편에 앉아서 수정구를 들여다봐.

segments.text: Okay.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 알겠어.

segments.text: She does what she is told. She sees nothing but a clear whiteness in the orb.
segments.translation: 그녀는 시키는 대로 했다. 구슬 안에는 맑고 하얀 빛 외에는 아무것도 보이지 않았다.

segments.text: Are you here to confess, to interpret a dream, or to seek the prophecy of the crystal?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 고해성사를 하러 온 건가, 꿈을 해석받으러 온 건가, 아니면 수정구의 예언을 찾으러 온 건가?

segments.text: I am here to confess ... and to seek the prophecy.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 고백하러... 그리고 예언을 구하러 왔습니다.

segments.text: Tell me about the vision in your heart.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 당신 마음속 환상에 대해 말해봐.

segments.text: The vision ...?
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: Hmm ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: She looks at the orb. The shape of the sphere becomes blurry and gradually fades out in her sight.
segments.translation: 그녀가 구체를 바라본다. 구의 형태가 흐릿해지더니 그녀의 시야에서 서서히 사라져간다.

segments.text: See myself falling ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 추락하고 있는 내 모습이 보여...

segments.text: There are two broken decks ... They were originally one piece.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 갈라진 갑판 두 개가 있는데... 원래는 하나였어.

segments.text: Every time I get closer to one deck, the other one sinks.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 내가 갑판 하나에 가까이 갈수록, 다른 하나가 계속 물속으로 가라앉아.

segments.text: People on it will fall with it.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그 갑판 위에 있던 사람들도 함께 밑으로 떨어지고.

segments.text: I can feel the coldness of the deep water, and the pains when they struggle.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 깊은 물 속의 차가움과 몸부림칠 때의 고통도 느껴져.

segments.text: Are you sad about it?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 그것 때문에 슬퍼?

segments.text: I feel fear.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 두려워.

segments.text: I see ... Which deck would you like to approach intuitively? Can you recognize the people on them?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 그렇군요... 어떤 덱에 직감적으로 끌리시나요? 그 카드들에 그려진 사람들을 알아보실 수 있으신가요?

segments.text: There is something bright on that deck, just like ... Timekeeper and Druvis ... It is warm there.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 갑판 위에 밝게 빛나는 게 보여. 마치... 타임키퍼와 드루비스처럼... 그곳은 따뜻해.

segments.text: ... You are attracted to it subconsciously. It guides the way of your heart.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: ... 너는 무의식적으로 그것에 끌리고 있어. 그것이 네 마음의 길을 인도하고 있는 거야.

segments.text: What about the other?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 다른 쪽은 어때?

segments.text: The other deck ... makes me feel comfortable, as if I have spent a long time there.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다른 갑판은... 내 마음을 편하게 해줘. 마치 거기서 긴 세월을 보낸 것 같아.

segments.text: I can trace back every step I take.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 내가 걸어온 모든 발걸음을 되짚어볼 수 있어.

segments.text: Perhaps that symbolizes your senses.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 아마도 그것이 당신의 감각을 상징하는 것 같네요.

segments.text: Sonetto, are you having trouble making a choice?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 소네트, 선택하는 데 어려움을 겪고 있는 거야?

segments.text: I can see the conflict ... between your instinct and senses.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 네 본능과 감각 사이의... 갈등이 보여.

segments.text: I heard you attended the committee's meeting today.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 오늘 위원회 회의에 참석했다고 들었어.

segments.text: Anything happened?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 무슨 일 있었어?

segments.text: I said something wrong.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 말실수를 했어.

segments.text: I was not properly prepared ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 준비를 충분히 못 했어...

segments.text: I was unable to help Timekeeper and Druvis; instead, I created a deeper misunderstanding.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼와 드루비스를 도와드리지 못했을 뿐만 아니라, 오히려 더 깊은 오해만 만들어냈어요.

segments.text: What choice should I make ... to resolve their conflict? Stalemate like that ... really scares me.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 어떤 선택을 해야 할까요... 그들의 갈등을 해결하려면? 저런 교착상태는... 정말 무서워요.

segments.text: Matilda can't find a word.
segments.translation: 마틸다는 할 말을 찾지 못했다.

segments.text: She sits there frozen, covering Sonetto's wrist with her palms.
segments.translation: 그녀는 그 자리에 얼어붙은 채 앉아서 손바닥으로 소네트의 손목을 덮고 있었다.

segments.text: The bright deck ... seems closer and larger.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 밝은 갑판이... 더 가깝고 크게 보여.

segments.text: Have you ever thought about following your heart?
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 마음이 이끄는 대로 살아본 적 있어?

segments.text: Sonetto, maybe you can try following your instinct for once.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 소네트, 가끔은 네 직감을 따라봐도 될 것 같은데.

segments.text: Maybe something unexpected will happen.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 뭔가 예상치 못한 일이 일어날지도 몰라.

segments.text: I tried.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 시도해봤어.

segments.text: ... Four years ago.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 4년 전이었습니다.

segments.text: I let them go ... That was the worst decision I have ever made.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그들을 놓아줬던 적이 있어... 내가 저지른 일 중 가장 잘못된 결정이었지.

segments.text: Sonetto's hands are on the orb again.
segments.translation: 소네트가 다시 수정구에 손을 올렸다.

segments.text: I am ready. Please tell me the right choice.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 난 준비됐어. 올바른 선택을 점쳐줘.

segments.text: ... Okay.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: ... 알겠어.

segments.text: As the chaotic snowflakes disappear, the shape of the orb is becoming blurry again.
segments.translation: 혼돈의 눈송이가 사라지면서 수정구의 형체가 다시 흐려지고 있다.

segments.text: Crystals emerge in thin air ...
segments.translation: 수정체들이 허공에 나타났다...

segments.text: ... One after another, they build up a symmetrical and balanced ship.
segments.translation: 하나씩 차례로 쌓아 올려 대칭적이고 균형 잡힌 배를 만들어 나간다.

segments.text: Everything has its trace to follow, its logic to function.
segments.translation: 모든 것에는 나름대로 이유가 있고, 그럴 만한 근거가 있다.

segments.text: "The reality has shown itself."
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 현실이 모습을 드러냈군.

segments.text: "Take the path you have already taken, walk the way you have already walked."
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 이미 걸어본 길을 다시 걸어가고, 이미 지나온 길을 다시 걸어가라.

segments.text: "You shall benefit from listening to the voice in your mind, as it is not yet time to dock."
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 마음속 목소리에 귀를 기울이는 것이 도움이 될 거야. 아직 정박할 때가 아니거든.

segments.text: Listen to the voice in my mind ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 머릿속에서 들려오는 소리를 듣는다라...

segments.text: I see.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 알겠어.

segments.text: I should not have hesitated.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 망설이지 말았어야 했는데.

segments.text: Thank you, Matilda. Your divination is very helpful ... My mind is very clear now.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 고마워, 마틸다. 네 점이 나한테 큰 도움이 됐어... 머리도 훨씬 맑아졌고.

segments.text: You're ... Ha, of course you should thank me!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 너는... 하, 당연히 나한테 고마워해야지!

segments.text: You should have known the resourcefulness of Ms. Matilda Bouanich much earlier.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 마틸다 부아니치 양의 수완을 진작 알아봤어야 했는데.

segments.text: For your information, those seeking my help must make an appointment at least 15 days before the divination, otherwise, they won't even get to see me!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 참고로 말해두는데, 내 도움을 받고 싶다면 점술을 받기 최소 15일 전에는 예약을 해야 해. 그렇지 않으면 내 얼굴도 보지 못할 거야!

segments.text: Haha.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 하하.

segments.text: You were very serious during the divination ... Even your tone was different from usual.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 점술을 할 때 정말 진지하셨어요... 평소와는 말투도 달랐고요.

segments.text: However, I am more familiar with the way you talk now ... It reminds me of our time at school.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 하지만 지금 말하시는 방식이 더 익숙해요... 학교에 있을 때가 생각나네요.

segments.text: Matilda stands there, transfixed.
segments.translation: 마틸다는 멍하니 서 있었다.

segments.text: Sonetto waves at her and walks out of the room.
segments.translation: 소네트가 그녀에게 손을 흔들고 방을 나갔다.

segments.text: Thank you for making time for me, Matilda.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 날 위해 시간을 내줘서 고마워, 마틸다.

segments.text: If you need my help next time, please let me know.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다음에 내 도움이 필요한 일이 생기면 꼭 알려줘.

segments.text: Good night.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 안녕히 주무세요.

segments.text: The door is carefully closed behind her.
segments.translation: 문이 그녀의 뒤로 조심스럽게 닫혔다.

segments.text: Richard, tends to oppose.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 리처드는 반대하는 경향이 있어.

segments.text: Gloria, tends to support.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 글로리아는 지원을 선호하는 편이야.

segments.text: Black Agate, tends to oppose.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 블랙 아게이트, 반대하는 성향이 있어.

segments.text: Ouzo, neutral.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 우조, 중립.

segments.text: The situation doesn't look good.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 상황이 좋지 않아 보이는군요.

segments.text: Do you have any news, Mark?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 소식 들어온 건 없어? 마크.

segments.text: Someone is spreading the minutes of your last meeting.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 누군가가 당신의 지난 회의록을 퍼뜨리고 있습니다.

segments.text: I didn't get any direct evidence, but apparently every voter has read the anonymous minutes.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 직접적인 증거는 얻지 못했지만, 모든 유권자가 그 익명 회의록을 읽은 것 같습니다.

segments.text: The topic about Vertin ... It has become a great disadvantage to us.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 버틴에 관한 화제... 우리에게는 큰 불리함이 되고 있어.

segments.text: Double envelopment ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 양쪽에서 협공해오는군...

segments.text: A "4-4 point double low approach" ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 4-4 포인트 더블 로우 어프로치라...

segments.text: No wonder they let the draft go through so easily.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 어쩐지 초안이 쉽게 통과되더라니.

segments.text: To reject the draft during the committee meeting does not actually address the real problem. The House of Integratus can still re-submit the draft during the next legislative session.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 위원회 회의에서 법안을 거부하는 것만으로는 진짜 문제가 해결되지 않아. 통합파는 다음 입법회기에서 얼마든지 법안을 다시 제출할 수 있거든.

segments.text: So she is planning for the long term ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그래서 그녀는 장기적으로 계획하고 있는 거군...

segments.text: To bring it down in the voting stage and make it a plan that is totally abandoned.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 투표 단계에서 무너뜨려서 완전히 폐기된 계획으로 만들려는 거지.

segments.text: I'm afraid so.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 그런 것 같습니다.

segments.text: A draft that has failed to win votes can hardly win the trust of the House's reviewers again, and of course it won't be submitted to the committee.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 표결에서 패배한 초안이 의회 심사위원들의 신뢰를 다시 얻기는 어렵고, 당연히 위원회에 제출되지도 않을 것입니다.

segments.text: She counts the names on the whiteboard again.
segments.translation: 그녀는 화이트보드에 있는 이름들을 다시 세어 봤다.

segments.text: Did anyone make any actual move yet?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 아직 실제로 움직인 사람이 있어?

segments.text: Not yet. The minutes only changed their preferences, but the number of those who have taken a stand still remains the same.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 아직이야. 회의록에는 선호도만 바뀌었을 뿐, 입장을 표명한 사람들의 수는 여전히 동일해.

segments.text: Hmm, just as I expected.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 음, 그건 예상했던 대로야.

segments.text: This draft is not about Vertin, but a promise to the future—about how to balance the benefits between different interest groups.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이 초안의 핵심은 버틴이 아니라 앞으로의 약속에 있어. 서로 다른 집단의 이익을 두고 균형을 어떻게 맞추냐는 거지.

segments.text: To reach that, we need to meet the expectations of those groups who have a need for flexible management, and also appease the conservatives and not shake their confidence in controlling the overall situation.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그 목표를 달성하려면 유연한 관리를 필요로 하는 집단들의 기대에 부응해야 하고, 동시에 보수파들을 달래서 전체 상황을 통제할 수 있다는 그들의 확신을 흔들지 않아야 해.

segments.text: Actually ...
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 사실...

segments.text: The delegate adjusts his tie and interrupts Madam Z in a clear voice.
segments.translation: 대표자는 넥타이를 매만지다 중간에 맑은 목소리로 Z의 분석을 끊었다.

segments.text: We do have an opportunity to change the game now.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 이제 우리에게 판세를 바꿀 기회가 있어.

segments.text: Opportunity?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 기회?

segments.text: He puts in "0411" on the keyboard attached to his wrist, and turns on the big screen.
segments.translation: 그는 손목에 부착된 키보드에 "0411을 입력하고 큰 화면을 켰다.

segments.text: Committee member Pedra appears on the screen.
segments.translation: 페드라 위원의 모습이 화면에 나타났다.

segments.text: I hereby challenge Delegate Mark Hal to a public debate on the revised draft of Storm Reformation: Manpower and Discipline.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 이에 마크 할 대표에게 폭풍우 개혁안: 인력과 규율 개정안에 대한 공개 토론을 신청합니다.

segments.text: This draft of his will bring unpredictable risks to the Foundation, yet Mark himself seems completely unaware of it.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그의 이 초안은 재단에 예측 불가능한 위험을 가져올 텐데, 마크 본인은 그것을 전혀 인지하지 못하고 있는 것 같군.

segments.text: I believe it is necessary to make such risks public in a legal way.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그런 위험 요소들을 법적인 방법으로 공개할 필요가 있다고 생각합니다.

segments.text: The delegate switches off the projection. As he turns to Madam Z, his cheeks have become rosy in heightened spirits.
segments.translation: 대표단이 투영을 끈다. 마담 Z를 향해 몸을 돌리자, 그의 뺨이 고조된 기분으로 인해 붉어져 있었다.

segments.text: See, I knew they were going to escalate Vertin's issue.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 봐, 버틴 문제를 확대시킬 거라고 했잖아.

segments.text: You want to accept this challenge?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이 도전을 받아들이겠나?

segments.text: ... All the internal media are reporting the news.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: ... 모든 내부 언론에서 이 소식을 보도하고 있습니다.

segments.text: If I step back, they will definitely humiliate me and take advantage of the public opinion to undermine the draft.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 내가 물러서면 그들은 분명히 나를 굴욕적으로 만들고 여론을 이용해서 초안을 무너뜨릴 거야.

segments.text: Mark ... That's a menacing move.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 마크... 이건 위험한 수야.

segments.text: Madam Z picks up Pedra's name card and sticks it to the board.
segments.translation: Z 여사가 페드라의 명함을 집어 들고 게시판에 붙인다.

segments.text: It is coming for us.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그것이 우리를 향해 오고 있어.

segments.text: No matter fight or flight, they have comprehensive preparation for this.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 정면 승부든 줄행랑이든, 녀석들은 모두 임기응변으로 대처할 거야.

segments.text: I would suggest taking the long view and not jumping to conclusions.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 난 장기적인 관점에서 의논하고 싶어. 너무 성급하게 결론짓지 말고.

segments.text: But defense without attack will never bring us victory, Madam Z.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 하지만 공격 없는 방어만으로는 절대 승리할 수 없습니다, Z님.

segments.text: I've always wanted an opportunity to defend the draft in public.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 공개적으로 초안을 변호할 기회를 항상 원했습니다.

segments.text: Concerning the questions they implied about Vertin, I've collected more than enough cases to refute them.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 버틴에 대해 그들이 암시한 의문들에 관해서는, 그것들을 반박할 충분한 사례들을 수집해두었습니다.

segments.text: Misleading questions twist people's opinions. It's time to tell them the truth.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 오해를 불러일으키는 질문들이 사람들의 의견을 왜곡시키고 있어. 이제 그들에게 진실을 말해줄 때야.

segments.text: The gaze behind Madam Z's glasses has become subtly piercing.
segments.translation: Z의 안경 너머 시선이 미묘하게 날카로워졌다.

segments.text: You have accepted it.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 받아들였구나.

segments.text: Was it in front of the media?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 언론 앞에서였나?

segments.text: I was there when Pedra challenged me ... so were the media.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 페드라가 나에게 도전했을 때 내가 그 자리에 있었어... 언론들도 마찬가지였고.

segments.text: ... Well I don't think it is going to be a complete mistake.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: ... 뭐, 완전히 잘못된 선택은 아닐 거라고 생각해.

segments.text: The lady in white seems to loosen up for a brief second.
segments.translation: 흰옷을 입은 여성의 얼굴에 잠시 긴장이 풀린 듯했다.

segments.text: She doesn't say a word ...
segments.translation: 그녀는 아무 말도 하지 않았다.

segments.text: ... but walks up to him and gives him a pat on the shoulder.
segments.translation: 하지만 그에게 다가가서 어깨를 토닥였다.

segments.text: It is a crucial debate.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이건 굉장히 중요한 변론이야.

segments.text: Do your best.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 잘 해봐.

segments.text: You don't have to come along with me.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나와 함께 올 필요 없어.

segments.text: I'm here to repel the pests in the woods. It's part of my daily routine.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲의 해충들을 퇴치하러 왔어. 일상적인 업무의 일부지.

segments.text: Thank you for your kindness, Ms. Druvis!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 친절하게 대해주셔서 감사해요, 드루비스 씨!

segments.text: It is fun to stay in Ms. Vertin's suitcase ... but I really feel like seeing the world out there.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 버틴 씨의 가방 안에 있는 것도 재미있지만... 밖의 세상도 정말 보고 싶어요.

segments.text: By the way, the pests you mentioned ... What are they?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 그런데, 아까 말한 해충들... 그게 뭐야?

segments.text: I've heard of a kind of giant worm called the Tatzelwurm. They live in caves, about two to five feet long, and their heads are like cats'.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 타첼부름이라는 거대한 벌레에 대해 들어본 적이 있어. 동굴에 살고, 길이가 약 60센티미터에서 1미터 50센티미터 정도 되는데, 머리가 고양이 같다고 해.

segments.text: Be very careful if you see one. Both its skin and breath are toxic!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 만약 그런 걸 본다면 정말 조심해. 피부도 숨도 모두 독성이거든!

segments.text: Druvis bends over, lifting a hanging branch to make a way for Sotheby to walk through.
segments.translation: 드루비스는 몸을 숙여 늘어진 나뭇가지를 들어 올렸고, 소더비가 지나갈 수 있도록 공간을 마련했다.

segments.text: Heh heh. I have never heard of such a terrible worm.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 흐흐. 그런 끔찍한 벌레는 처음 들어보는군.

segments.text: Hopefully we will not encounter any.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 아무것도 마주치지 않았으면 좋겠네.

segments.text: Sotheby jumps briskly over some roots crawling by her feet.
segments.translation: 소더비는 발밑을 가로막고 있는 나무뿌리를 날렵하게 뛰어넘었다.

segments.text: Hah, uh!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 하, 어!

segments.text: So what are we disinfesting this time?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 그래서 이번엔 뭘 박멸하러 가는 거야?

segments.text: Oak processionary moths. Perhaps a few gray squirrel cubs.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 참나무독나방들. 아마 회색다람쥐 새끼 몇 마리도 있을 거야.

segments.text: It's not enough to only rely on potions and arcanum to keep the woods in peace ... Oak trees reside here, and everything will change with it.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲의 평화를 지키는 데 물약과 마도술만으로는 충분하지 않아... 참나무들이 이곳에 자리 잡고 있고, 그것과 함께 모든 것이 변할 거야.

segments.text: Animals that live in symbiosis, fungi that depend on each other, all of them will embrace diversity by the day.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 공생하는 동물들, 서로 의존하는 균류들, 그 모든 것들이 날이 갈수록 다양성을 받아들이게 될 거야.

segments.text: Sotheby suddenly looks up and points to the direction to the edge of the woods.
segments.translation: 소더비가 갑자기 고개를 들어 숲 가장자리 쪽을 가리켰다.

segments.text: Do you mean that?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 정말이에요?

segments.text: A group of grey fluff is flying over there!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 저기 회색 털뭉치들이 날아다니고 있어!

segments.text: Druvis looks in the direction her finger points to.
segments.translation: 드루비스의 시선은 그녀의 손가락이 가리키는 쪽을 따라간다.

segments.text: Clusters of fluff, in gray and brown, coming together and forming a flossy tornado in front of them, fly and dance in the air.
segments.translation: 회색과 갈색의 솜털 덩어리들이 모여들어 그들 앞에서 푹신한 토네이도를 이루며 공중에서 날아다니고 춤을 춘다.

segments.text: ... A swarm of oak processionary moths!
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 참나무독나방 떼구나!

segments.text: They are preying on something.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 저들이 뭔가를 노리고 있어.

segments.text: A fuzzy figure in red at the center seems familiar.
segments.translation: 중앙에 있는 어렴풋한 빨간 형체가 친숙하게 느껴진다.

segments.text: Ms. Druvis, let's help out right away!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 드루비스 씨, 바로 도와드려요!

segments.text: I almost thought I was caught in a nightmare. This APPLe has never seen so many moths.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 악몽을 꾸는 줄 알았어요. 저 APPLe은 이렇게 많은 나방은 처음 보거든요.

segments.text: He is trembling from his stalk to the bottom.
segments.translation: 그는 줄기부터 밑동까지 온몸이 떨리고 있었다.

segments.text: Ugh. This APPLe is going to have PTSD from insects.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 윽, 어쩌면 저 APPLe은 곤충으로 인해 PTSD를 겪을 것 같네요.

segments.text: They are very sensitive to the scent of sap.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그들은 수액 냄새에 매우 민감해.

segments.text: With all due respect, even among all the plants, Mr. APPLe is quite attractive to insects.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 실례지만, 모든 식물 중에서도 APPLe 씨는 벌레들에게 상당히 매력적이에요.

segments.text: So it was the scent that attracted them. No wonder Mr. APPLe's invisibility didn't work.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 냄새 때문에 끌려온 거였구나. APPLe 씨의 투명화가 통하지 않은 이유를 알겠어.

segments.text: Thank goodness we are here!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 다행히 우리가 여기 있네!

segments.text: Druvis carefully cleans off the fluff on APPLe with her handkerchief.
segments.translation: 드루비스는 APPLe에게 묻어 있는 솜털을 손수건으로 꼼꼼히 닦아냈다.

segments.text: Until he restores his handsomeness.
segments.translation: 그가 잘생긴 모습을 되찾을 때까지.

segments.text: Mr. APPLe, did you find out anything?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: APPLe 씨, 뭔가 알아낸 게 있나요?

segments.text: Yes, Ms. Druvis. I brought something insignificant.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그럼요, 드루비스 씨. 소소한 소식이 몇 가지 있어요.

segments.text: As we planned earlier, I disguised myself and reached the office building next to us.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 전 계획했던 대로 몸을 숨긴 채 옆에 있는 오피스 빌딩에 무사히 도착했었어요.

segments.text: There is a device to detect arcane power at the entrance, however, this APPLe pried out what we needed from the guards.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 입구에 마도술을 감지하는 장치가 있었지만, 저 APPLe이 경비원들로부터 필요한 정보를 캐냈어요.

segments.text: What, what is it?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어, 어떻게 된 거야?

segments.text: Did Ms. Vertin win on that voting list?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 버틴 씨가 그 투표에서 이겼나요?

segments.text: Sadly, not yet.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 매우 안타깝게도 그러지 못했습니다.

segments.text: It's not time for a formal vote. Everyone is cautious and remains neutral.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 아직 정식 표결 전이에요. 모두가 매우 신중하게 중립적인 태도를 유지하고 있어요.

segments.text: Apart from that, there are some rumors in the Foundation ... They are not very favorable to Vertin.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그 외에도, 재단 내에서는 몇 가지 소문이... 버틴에게 그리 호의적이지 않은 소문들이 돌고 있어요.

segments.text: Rumors ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 소문들...

segments.text: It sounds as though the situation that Madam Z handles is more complicated and volatile than I thought.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: Z 부인이 처리하고 있는 상황이 내가 생각했던 것보다 훨씬 복잡하고 불안정한 것 같군.

segments.text: However, the votes have not been lopsided under such bad circumstances ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 하지만 이런 악조건 속에서도 표결이 일방적이지는 않았어...

segments.text: Perhaps that means the arcanists who share our aspirations are not in the minority.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 아마도 우리와 같은 뜻을 품은 마도사들이 소수가 아니라는 뜻일 거야.

segments.text: That said, I'm afraid we are starting a protracted war, Ms. Druvis.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그럴것도 같지만... 장기전을 대비해야 할지도 모르겠네요, 드루비스 씨.

segments.text: Yes. I know. I've taken an inventory of the supplies. We can still hang in there for four weeks and a half.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 네. 알고 있어요. 보급품 재고를 확인해봤거든요. 4주 반 정도는 더 버틸 수 있을 것 같아요.

segments.text: Although they have cut off the water and electricity supplies in the building, we can still live on the resources in the suitcase for a while.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 건물의 상하수도와 전기 공급이 차단되었지만, 가방 안의 자원으로 당분간은 버틸 수 있을 거야.

segments.text: There are fewer guards destroying the woods, probably because the abatis works.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲을 파괴하는 경비병들이 줄어들었네, 아마 장애물이 효과를 보고 있는 것 같아.

segments.text: What worries this APPLe is that if the procedure to finalise the draft takes more than four weeks and a half, we would ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 저 APPLe이 우려하는 건 초안을 완성하는 절차가 4주 반 이상 걸리면 저희가...

segments.text: We would then survive by gradually shrinking our territory ... until Madam Z's draft is officially approved.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그러면 우리는 영역을 점진적으로 축소하며 버텨내야 할 것입니다... Z 부인의 초안이 공식 승인될 때까지 말이죠.

segments.text: We have chosen the thorny trail, and so we are destined to burn our boats and never look back.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 우리는 가시밭길을 선택했고, 그렇기에 배수의 진을 치고 뒤돌아보지 않을 운명이야.

segments.text: Vertin ... She is worth fighting for.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 버틴... 그녀를 위해서라면 싸울 가치가 있어.

segments.text: For this point, Captain and this APPLe have absolutely no disagreement.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그 점에 대해서는 저 APPLe과 캡틴도 전혀 이견이 없습니다.

segments.text: Then this APPLe will keep scouting around for updates so that we could respond in time.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 그렇다면 저 APPLe은 앞으로 적절히 대응할 수 있도록 최신 소식을 계속 알아보겠습니다.

segments.text: Sotheby's eyes are fixed in another direction.
segments.translation: 소더비의 시선이 다른 쪽에 고정되어 있다.

segments.text: What are you looking at, Ms. Sotheby?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 뭘 보고 있는 거야, 소테비?

segments.text: Over there ... It feels like someone is staring at us.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 저기... 누군가 우리를 지켜보고 있는 것 같아.

segments.text: They both look over to that corner.
segments.translation: 둘 다 그 모퉁이 쪽을 바라보았다.

segments.text: There is nothing but shadows. The darkness looks like a pond of unimaginable depth.
segments.translation: 그곳에는 마치 끝이 보이지 않는 깊은 연못처럼 조용한 어둠만 존재할 뿐이었다.

segments.text: Druvis stands up.
segments.translation: 드루비스가 일어섰다.

segments.text: Let's go back.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 돌아가자.

segments.text: To the deep woods.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 깊은 숲으로.

segments.text: Committee member Pedra walks out of the changing room.
segments.translation: 페드라 위원이 탈의실에서 나왔다.

segments.text: He sees Delegate Mark sitting in front of a mirror and shaping his sideburns into sharp summits with pomade.
segments.translation: 그는 거울 앞에 앉아 포마드로 구레나룻을 날카로운 산봉우리 모양으로 다듬고 있는 대표 마크를 바라본다.

segments.text: A tie, ablaze with bright colors, is around his neck.
segments.translation: 그의 목에는 밝은색으로 타오르는 넥타이가 매여 있다.

segments.text: Isn't that scarf a bit too high-profile?
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그 스카프 너무 눈에 띄는 거 아냐?

segments.text: Mark stops his beauty procedures and looks at Pedra in the mirror.
segments.translation: 마크가 미용 관리를 멈추고 거울 속 페드라를 바라본다.

segments.text: I think it fits me just well.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 나한테 딱 맞는 것 같아.

segments.text: You chose a grey shirt. Wise decision.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 회색 셔츠를 선택하셨군요. 현명한 결정입니다.

segments.text: Looks like you're fully prepared.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 완전히 준비가 된 것 같군요.

segments.text: Mark doesn't answer that question. Instead, he pulls out a volume of files and starts to draw and write on them.
segments.translation: 마크는 그 질문에 답하지 않는다. 대신 서류 뭉치를 꺼내어 그 위에 그림을 그리고 글을 쓰기 시작한다.

segments.text: Ladies and gentlemen, allow me to introduce the first debater of the day, Pedra Paul Gonzalez Rosa.
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 신사 숙녀 여러분, 오늘 첫 번째 토론자를 소개해드리겠습니다. 페드라 파울 곤잘레스 로사입니다.

segments.text: Graduated from the Law School of the University of São Paulo, he is a member of the committee and more importantly, the challenger of the debate.
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 상파울루 대학교 법학과를 졸업한 그는 위원회의 일원이자, 더 중요하게는 이번 토론의 도전자입니다.

segments.text: Pedra lifts the curtain and steps onto the stage.
segments.translation: 페드라는 커튼을 들어 올리고 무대 위로 올라간다.

segments.text: The other debater of the day is the delegate of the House of Integratus, Mark Hal. Over the past ten years, he has served the Foundation by drafting countless acts and conventions.
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 오늘의 또 다른 토론자는 통합파 의원인 마크 할입니다. 지난 10년간 그는 수많은 법안과 협약을 기초하며 재단을 모셔왔습니다.

segments.text: The topic of the debate today, Storm Reformation: Manpower and Discipline, is exactly a work of his.
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 오늘 토론 주제인 폭풍우 개혁: 인력과 규율은 바로 그분의 작품이지.

segments.text: Not one seat has been left empty around the debate stage.
segments.translation: 변론대 아래에는 빈자리를 찾아볼 수 없었다.

segments.text: Madam Z's eyes follow Mark as he walks into the lights on the stage with a big smile.
segments.translation: Z는 마크가 환한 미소를 지으며 무대 조명 속으로 걸어가는 모습을 눈으로 따라갔다.

segments.text: The people on the stage are greeting each other. Madam Z takes off her glasses and wipes them again.
segments.translation: 무대 위의 사람들은 인사를 나누고 있었다. Z는 안경을 벗어 한 번 더 닦았다.

segments.text: The chamber is filled with noises. The confrontation between the two sides in her blurred vision is a scene she has seen many times.
segments.translation: 방 안이 소음으로 가득했다. 흐릿한 시야 속에서 벌어지는 양측의 대립은 그녀가 수없이 봐온 광경이었다.

segments.text: Alright, both sides are seated.
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 좋아, 양측 모두 착석했다.

segments.text: Before we start the debate officially, I suggest we give Mark the draft writer an opportunity to introduce the draft.
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 공식적으로 토론을 시작하기 전에, 초안 작성자인 마크에게 초안을 소개할 기회를 드리는 것이 좋겠습니다.

segments.text: Would you please, Mark?
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 마크, 부탁드립니다.

segments.text: With pleasure.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 기꺼이 하겠습니다.

segments.text: Storm Reformation and its advocators believe in such a goal:
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 폭풍우 개혁파와 그 지지자들이 믿는 목표는 다음과 같다:

segments.text: In this ever changing environment smitten by the "Storm," this draft will help the Foundation win the trust of a considerable number of arcanists who have different backgrounds and abilities, in a more efficient and stable way.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 폭풍우에 휩쓸린 이 변화무쌍한 환경에서, 이 초안은 재단이 다양한 배경과 능력을 가진 상당수의 마도술사들의 신뢰를 보다 효율적이고 안정적인 방식으로 얻는 데 도움이 될 것입니다.

segments.text: That is exactly where I must raise an objection.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 바로 그 점에 대해 이의를 제기해야겠습니다.

segments.text: The draft has a huge risk which Mark Hal has not realized at all.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그 초안에는 마크 할이 전혀 깨닫지 못한 엄청난 위험이 있습니다.

segments.text: No, sir. I totally understand what you're trying to say.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 아니요, 선생님. 말씀하시려는 바를 완전히 이해합니다.

segments.text: You have put forward several questionable arguments to prove Vertin's suspicion of disloyalty.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 버틴의 불충 의혹을 증명하기 위해 몇 가지 의심스러운 논거를 제시하셨군요.

segments.text: In response to that, please allow me to invoke the following cases to prove Vertin's competence for leading the unregistered arcanists.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 그에 대한 응답으로, 버틴이 미등록 마도술사들을 이끌 자격이 있음을 증명하기 위해 다음 사례들을 제시하는 것을 허락해 주십시오.

segments.text: Please turn to page 373 of Vertin's personnel file. As you can see, since Vertin became the Timekeeper, the number of unregistered arcanists she has rescued so far is, 63.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 버틴의 인사 파일 373페이지를 펼쳐보시기 바랍니다. 보시다시피, 버틴이 타임키퍼가 된 이후 지금까지 구조한 미등록 마도사의 수는 63명입니다.

segments.text: That is a number unmatched by that of anyone present. If that's not enough to prove her loyalty, let's continue ...
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 여기 있는 그 누구도 따라올 수 없는 수치야. 그것만으로도 그녀의 충성심을 증명하기에 충분하지 않다면, 계속해보자...

segments.text: I have to say, Mark, you have completely misunderstood my point of view.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 마크, 솔직히 말하자면 당신은 내 관점을 완전히 잘못 이해하고 있습니다.

segments.text: I don't care what Vertin has done.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 버틴이 뭘 했든 상관없어.

segments.text: But the feasibility of the draft.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 하지만 초안의 실현 가능성은.

segments.text: According to the existing regulations, the duties of educating and disciplining unregistered arcanists are taken by the School of Discipline.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 기존 규정에 따르면, 미등록 마도술사들을 교육하고 징계하는 업무는 징계학교에서 담당하고 있습니다.

segments.text: While you suggested in the draft that Timekeeper's personal teaching would replace the current collective training ...
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 초안에서 제안하신 바에 따르면 타임키퍼의 개인 교육이 현재의 집단 훈련을 대체한다고 하셨는데...

segments.text: Have you ever thought about the budget that we could possibly spend on it?
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 그것에 들어갈 수 있는 예산에 대해 생각해본 적이 있나?

segments.text: The Foundation spends an alarming sum of money on education every year, and there is no way we pay extra for personal training.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 재단에서는 매년 교육비로 엄청난 돈을 쓰고 있는데, 개인 훈련비까지 추가로 지불할 리는 없지.

segments.text: What, budget?
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 뭐, 예산?

segments.text: Um, I don't see why we're talking about budget all of a sudden.
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 음, 갑자기 왜 예산 얘기를 하는 건지 모르겠는데요.

segments.text: Did you really read the draft? I didn't mention a word about budget ...
segments.speaker: Delegate
segments.translation: 정말로 초안을 읽어본 거야? 예산에 대해서는 한 마디도 언급하지 않았는데...

segments.text: Of course you didn't, which exactly proves you have never realized the risk I just mentioned.
segments.speaker: Committee Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 물론 몰랐겠지. 그것이 바로 네가 내가 방금 언급한 위험을 전혀 깨닫지 못했다는 증거야.

segments.text: Oh, it seems the real topic of the debate has just surfaced.
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 오, 토론의 진짜 주제가 이제야 수면 위로 떠오른 것 같군요.

segments.text: I believe everyone in the hall is looking forward to where it goes. So Mark, in terms of this point, we would like to know your real thoughts ...
segments.speaker: Debate Moderator
segments.translation: 홀에 계신 모든 분들이 이 논의가 어떻게 전개될지 기대하고 계실 것 같습니다. 그럼 마크 씨, 이 부분에 대해서 당신의 진솔한 생각을 듣고 싶은데요...

segments.text: She gets up, walking towards the entrance.
segments.translation: 그녀는 일어서서 입구로 걸어간다.

segments.text: This is already a composition which the White would like to see.
segments.translation: 이미 화이트가 보고 싶어 할 만한 구도다.

segments.text: The Black stone is left there alone. That last move is also a defense in panic.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 흑돌이 홀로 남겨져 있어. 마지막 수도 당황해서 둔 수비수야.

segments.text: If I were the player...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 만약 돌을 쥔 자가 나였다면...

segments.text: She gazes into the air, lost in her thoughts. She doesn't feel the gaze cast upon her from another direction.
segments.translation: 그녀는 허공을 바라보며 생각에 잠겨 있었다. 다른 방향에서 자신을 바라보는 시선을 느끼지 못했다.

segments.text: Constantine is watching Madam Z from her corner.
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴은 구석에서 Z를 바라보고 있었다.

segments.text: As Madam Z walks to the entrance, somebody stops her.
segments.translation: 입구로 걸어가던 Z를 누군가가 가로막았다.

segments.text: A white item is handed to her.
segments.translation: 흰색 물건이 그녀에게 건네졌다.

segments.text: And then ...
segments.translation: 그리고...

segments.text: She disappears as soon as she steps out of the hall.
segments.translation: 그녀는 홀을 나서자마자 모습을 감췄다.

segments.text: Constantine averts her eyes and looks back at the two debaters on the stage.
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴은 시선을 거두더니, 무대 위에서 첨예하게 대립 중인 두 사람을 다시 주시하기 시작했다.

segments.text: As soon as she has left the hall, Madam Z takes out that white note.
segments.translation: 회의장을 나온 마담 Z는 다시 그 흰색 쪽지를 꺼냈다.

segments.text: What is it?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이게 뭐지?

segments.text: Sonetto asked me to give it to you personally.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 소네트가 직접 전해달라고 부탁했어요.

segments.text: It looks like a simple, usual letter.
segments.translation: 평범한 편지로 보였다.

segments.text:
"Dear Madam Z, 
With this letter I send you my best regards."
segments.translation:
'Z 씨께, 
이 편지와 함께 안부를 전합니다.

segments.text: "I have been instructed to manage affairs on behalf of Timekeeper during her treatment."
segments.translation: 타임키퍼가 치료받는 동안, 전 명령대로 타임키퍼 관련 업무를 처리했습니다.

segments.text: "Please let me know if there are any missions to alleviate the situation. I will do my best to meet your expectations."
segments.translation: 현재 상황을 개선할 수 있는 임무가 있다면 뭐든 알려주세요. 절대 기대를 저버리지 않고 최선을 다하겠습니다.

segments.text:
"Sincerely, 
Sonetto"
segments.translation: 소네트 올림

segments.text: Good news.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 좋은 소식이군.

segments.text: Oh. You're also here?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 어? 너도 여기 있었구나?

segments.text: Sonetto hears her. She stops the practice.
segments.translation: 소네트가 그녀의 말을 듣고 연습을 멈추었다.

segments.text: Yes ... I am taking combat drills with the Artificial Somnambulism training system.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네... 저는 인공 몽유병 훈련 시스템으로 전투 훈련을 받고 있습니다.

segments.text: Lilya casts a sideways look at the screen in front of Sonetto. There shows her overall time length of practice.
segments.translation: 릴리야가 소네트 앞 화면을 옆으로 힐끗 바라본다. 화면에는 그녀의 총 연습 시간이 표시되어 있었다.

segments.text: 6 hours ...
segments.speaker: Lilya

segments.text: I'm not the only one goofing around.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 장난치는 건 나만이 아니잖아.

segments.text: No, I'm not. I am not goofing around.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아니에요, 그렇지 않아요. 전 한가하지 않다고요...

segments.text: I am waiting for orders.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전 명령 대기 중이에요.

segments.text: Her face flushes scarlet.
segments.translation: 그녀의 얼굴이 붉게 물들었다.

segments.text: Lilya initiates the machine in front of her, unaware of her awkwardness.
segments.translation: 릴리아는 앞에 있는 기계의 전원을 켜느라 자신의 어색함을 눈치채지 못했다.

segments.text: Well, much luckier than me.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 음, 나보다는 훨씬 운이 좋네.

segments.text: I have so many things to bitch about ... "One who plays hooky." Have you heard it? Literally me.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 불만이 한두 개가 아니야... 땡땡이치는 애.' 들어봤어? 완전 나 얘기잖아.

segments.text: I should have turned down the offer when they promoted me to the Foundation headquarters. They don't have any field missions for a flying witch …
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 재단 본부로 승진 제안을 받았을 때 거절했어야 했는데. 하늘을 나는 마녀에게 줄 야외 임무가 없다니...

segments.text: Is it because of the provisions of Talent Protection?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재능 보호 조항 때문인가요?

segments.text: Only God knows.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 신만이 아실 거야.

segments.text: House Arrest may be a better name.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 가택 연금이라고 하는 게 더 맞을 것 같은데.

segments.text: She throws a casual glance at the screen.
segments.translation: 그녀는 아무렇지 않은 듯 화면을 힐끗 쳐다본다.

segments.text: Look, since we're both bored to death, do you want to have a try at some difficult things?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 봐, 우리 둘 다 지루해 죽겠으니까, 좀 어려운 걸 한번 해볼래?

segments.text: What is it?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그게 뭔가요?

segments.text: Hm, this.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 흠, 이거네.

segments.text: She pouts her lips, hinting at something which she thinks should be obvious to both of them.
segments.translation: 그녀는 입술을 삐죽 내밀며, 둘 다 당연히 알고 있어야 할 것이라고 생각하는 무언가를 암시했다.

segments.text: Have you tried the Artificial Somnambulism joint training?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 인공 몽유병 합동 훈련 해봤어?

segments.text: Put on the helmet together, and switch to multiplayer mode …
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 헬멧을 같이 쓰고, 멀티플레이어 모드로 바꿔...

segments.text: Two operators can take on a harder training mode ... more insane enemies ... Haha.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 오퍼레이터 둘이서 더 어려운 훈련 모드에 도전할 수 있어... 더 미친 적들이 나오지... 하하.

segments.text: Like playing in the arcade.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 아케이드에서 게임하는 것 같네.

segments.text: Sonetto stares blankly at Lilya as she operates the machines.
segments.translation: 소네트는 넋이 나간 듯 릴리아가 기계를 다루는 모습을 바라보았다.

segments.text: O-Okay. Shall I turn this red knob?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 좋, 좋아요. 빨간 손잡이를 돌리면 되나요?

segments.text: She is a bit worried, not sure what to do; she has to imitate what Lilya just did.
segments.translation: 그녀는 약간 걱정스러워하며 어떻게 해야 할지 확신하지 못했다. 릴리야가 방금 한 행동을 따라 해야 했다.

segments.text: And she murmurs ...
segments.translation: 그리고는 중얼거렸다...

segments.text: ... What is an arcade?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 게임기가 뭐지?

segments.text: The floor starts to vibrate as the machine goes into function.
segments.translation: 기계의 영향으로 지면에 약간의 진동이 전해졌다.

segments.text: The multiplayer mode has been initiated.
segments.translation: 2인 모드가 시작되었다.

segments.text: What did you say? I can't hear you with my helmet on.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 뭐라고 했어? 헬멧을 쓰고 있어서 잘 안 들려.

segments.text: Whoo, nice controller. Good! I'm entering the zone now.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 우후, 좋은 컨트롤러네. 좋아! 이제 집중 모드 들어간다.

segments.text: It's been a long time. Why not have some fun?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 오랜만이네. 좀 재미있게 놀아볼까?

segments.text: She quickly taps on some buttons, and the warning indicator on Sonetto's equipment suddenly flashes a red light.
segments.translation: 그녀가 재빠르게 몇 개의 버튼을 누르자, 소네트의 장비에 있던 경고 표시등이 갑자기 빨간 불빛을 깜박였다.

segments.text: The light is flashing ... What did you press?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여기 불빛이 깜빡거리는데... 뭘 누르신 거죠?

segments.text: I switched it to the hardest mode! Haha! You better get it together!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 최고 난이도로 바꿨어! 하하! 정신 차리고 해야 할 거야!

segments.text: W-Wait ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 자, 잠깐만요...

segments.text: But there's no time to "wait." Two words in big red font appear on the screen in front of them: DRILL STARTS.
segments.translation: 하지만 기다릴 시간은 없었다. 그들 앞 화면에 빨간 대문자로 두 단어가 나타났다: 훈련 시작.

segments.text: Don't fail me, top student.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 실망시키지 마, 수석.

segments.text: The helmet has cut off their vital fluids and diverted them to a pre-programmed battlefield. The operators' vision is about to change ...
segments.translation: 헬멧이 그들의 생체 유체를 차단하고 미리 프로그래밍된 전장으로 전환시켰다. 조작자들의 시야가 곧 바뀔 것이다...

segments.text: Ha ... Almost choking.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 하... 거의 숨이 막힐 뻔했네.

segments.text: They take off their helmets, slumping onto the floor together.
segments.translation: 두 사람은 헬멧을 벗은 뒤 거의 동시에 바닥에 쓰러졌다.

segments.text: Their gloves are soaked in sweat.
segments.translation: 장갑이 땀에 흠뻑 젖었다.

segments.text: They subside into momentary silence, looking at each other.
segments.translation: 그들은 잠시 침묵에 빠져 서로를 바라보았다.

segments.text: They burst into laughter in high spirits.
segments.translation: 그리곤 유쾌한 웃음을 터뜨렸다.

segments.text: Hahahahaha ... hahaha ... I haven't had so much fun for centuries!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 하하하하하... 하하하... 몇 세기 만에 이렇게 재미있는 일이야!

segments.text: Heh heh ... Hahaha ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 헤헤... 하하하...

segments.text: How many times did we die?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 우리가 몇 번이나 죽었지?

segments.text: Sorry, haha ... I cannot do math now.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 미안해요, 하하... 다 세지 못했어요.

segments.text: My mind ... goes blank ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 머리 속이... 하얘졌어요...

segments.text: Hahahaha ... who would expect THE Sonetto would have a brain fade ...
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 하하하하... 그 소네트가 멍때릴 줄 누가 알았겠어...

segments.text: Lilya falls backwards, lying on her back, staring at the white ceiling with peaceful joy.
segments.translation: 릴리야가 뒤로 넘어져 등을 대고 누운 채, 평온한 기쁨으로 하얀 천장을 바라보았다.

segments.text: Sonetto leans on the wall, exhausted.
segments.translation: 소네트는 지쳐서 벽에 기댔다.

segments.text: It was a fight of verve and vitality. All the noises that have been nagging them for days now seem to have disappeared.
segments.translation: 활력과 생기로 가득한 싸움이었다. 며칠간 그들을 괴롭혀온 모든 소음이 이제 사라진 것 같았다.

segments.text: There are only breaths, the wind, and the smell of the concrete floor.
segments.translation: 숨소리와 바람, 그리고 콘크리트 바닥의 냄새만이 남아 있었다.

segments.text: Have you heard the result of the debate?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 토론 결과 들었어?

segments.text: I heard that ... the number of people opposing the draft significantly increased after the debate.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 들었는데... 토론 후에 초안에 반대하는 사람들이 크게 늘었다고 하더군요.

segments.text: Hm ...
segments.speaker: Lilya

segments.text: It's not going well.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 잘 안 되고 있어.

segments.text: Soon will be the voting session. The opposition is taking the lead.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 곧 투표가 시작될 거야. 반대파가 우세하고 있어.

segments.text: ... I hope Ms. Druvis can hold out.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 드루비스 씨 일행이 견뎌냈으면 좋겠네요.

segments.text: You visited them?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그들을 만나러 갔었어?

segments.text: I submitted a request to enter that building ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그 건물로 가는 신청서를 제출했었어요...

segments.text: The system arranged guards to accompany me to ensure my safety.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 시스템은 제 안전을 위해 저한테 수행 경비원을 붙여줬고요.

segments.text: The moment they entered the building, they started sawing the trees ... saying that they need to carve out the path.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 경비원들이 건물에 들어서자마자 나무를 톱으로 자르기 시작하더니... 지나갈 길을 만들어야 한다고 했어요.

segments.text: Since then ... I have not been there.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그 이후로는... 다시 가보지 않았어요.

segments.text: Four and a half weeks. After that, they can't hold on for any longer.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 4주 반이야. 그 이후엔 더 이상 버틸 수 없어.

segments.text: Really? In that case ... the vote result has to come out before that.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그래요? 그렇다면... 반드시 4주 안에 투표 결과가 나와야 하겠군요.

segments.text: Sonetto is deep in contemplation.
segments.translation: 소네트는 깊은 생각에 잠겼다.

segments.text: Hi, may the peace be with us.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 안녕하세요, 우리에게 평화가 함께하길 바라요.

segments.text: Hello! May the peace be with us.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 안녕하세요! 평화가 우리와 함께하길.

segments.text: Do you mind giving us some privacy?
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 잠시 자리를 비워주실 수 있을까요?

segments.text: Do whatever you like.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 마음대로 해.

segments.text: They walk to the break room in the hallway.
segments.translation: 그들은 복도의 탕비실로 걸어간다.

segments.text: Here is Madam Z's message. Please visit her in the office on Friday.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: Z 여사님의 메시지입니다. 금요일에 사무실로 찾아뵙도록 하세요.

segments.text: Ah ... Okay. Copy that! Thank you for the message.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아... 네, 알겠습니다! 알려주셔서 감사해요.

segments.text: With pleasure.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 기꺼이 도와드리겠습니다.

segments.text: She nods and places her hand on her chest.
segments.translation: 그녀는 고개를 끄덕인 뒤 가슴에 손을 얹었다.

segments.text: Wish you a good day.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 좋은 하루 되세요.

segments.text: Secretary Sharon leaves the room at a quick trot.
segments.translation: 비서 샤론은 빠른 걸음으로 방을 나섰다.

segments.text: When Sonetto returns to her exercise equipment, she finds Lilya is about to leave the room.
segments.translation: 소네트가 운동기구로 돌아왔을 때, 릴리야가 막 방을 나가려는 참이었다.

segments.text: Are you leaving?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 가시는 건가요?

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: She picks up her gloves and the canteen but hesitates. She pauses for a brief moment, then quickly turns back to Sonetto.
segments.translation: 그녀는 장갑과 수통을 집어 들었지만 망설였다. 잠시 멈춰 서더니, 재빨리 몸을 돌려 소네트를 향했다.

segments.text: Do you know how the penalties for destruction of public property of the Foundation and brawl are determined?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 재단 공공재물 파손죄와 난투죄의 처벌이 어떻게 결정되는지 알고 있나?

segments.text: Well, according to Measures of the Foundation for Administrative Penalties, based on the severity of the circumstances, fines will be imposed and the offender's salaries shall be deducted accordingly in minor cases, while detention or expulsion shall be imposed in major cases.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음, 재단 행정처분 규정에 따르면, 상황의 경중에 따라 경미한 경우에는 벌금을 부과하고 해당자의 급여를 차감하며, 중대한 경우에는 구금이나 퇴학 처분을 내리게 되어 있습니다.

segments.text: The penalty also depends on what is damaged. For example, production tools, household goods, buildings, equipment, facilities, etc. These are the properties that involve less cost and limited influence if damaged.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 처벌의 정도는 손상된 물건에 따라서도 달라집니다. 예를 들어, 생산 도구, 생활용품, 건물, 장비, 시설 등이 있죠. 이런 것들은 손상되더라도 비용이 적게 들고 영향도 제한적인 재산들입니다.

segments.text: If the number of people involved in a brawl is equal to or less than eight, and there are no major casualties, the penalty will be minor.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 사적인 몸싸움의 경우 연루된 사람이 8명 이하이고, 명백한 사상자가 없으면 가벼운 벌에 처해요.

segments.text: May I ask what happened? Why are you asking this all of a sudden?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 실례지만, 무슨 일 있었나요? 너무 갑작스러운 질문이라서요.

segments.text: Nothing. As I said, bored to death.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 아무것도 아니야. 말했잖아, 지겨워 죽겠다고.

segments.text: So bored that I have been paying attention to the Foundation's regulations. Even the Flying Manuals failed to win this much of my attention.
segments.speaker: Lilya
