segments.translation: 우리한테 너는 이 세계에서 유일하게 남은... 친구라고!

segments.text: All the waiting has been worthwhile.
segments.translation: 모든 기다림에 대해 제대로 된 보상이 주어진 것 같았다.

segments.text: In the meantime, footsteps come from a distance.
segments.translation: 그 사이 멀리서 발소리가 들려온다.

segments.text: Footsteps of well-trained, strong soldiers.
segments.translation: 잘 훈련된 강인한 병사들의 발소리였다.

segments.text: Welcome back, Vertin.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 돌아왔구나, 버틴.

segments.text: A figure in a white robe emerges in the woods.
segments.translation: 흰 가운을 입은 사람이 숲에 나타났다.

segments.text: We have good news to share.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 좋은 소식이 있어.

segments.text: Next to her, stand Sonetto, Madam Z, and some unfamiliar faces.
segments.translation: 그녀 옆에는 소네트, Z 부인, 그리고 낯선 얼굴들이 서 있다.

segments.text: The moment their eyes meet in the air, Sonetto opens her mouth—but she eventually doesn't speak a word.
segments.translation: 공중에서 두 사람의 시선이 마주치는 순간, 소네트가 입을 열었다가—결국 한 마디도 하지 않았다.

segments.text: ... This is good. This is great.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...이것도 좋아, 아주 좋아.

segments.text: May I ask what good news?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 실례지만 좋은 소식이란 게 뭡니까?

segments.text: The passage of the bill—Storm Reformation: Manpower and Discipline.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 법안 통과—폭풍우 개혁: 인력과 규율.

segments.text: Once it's approved by the Pax Security Council, it will become law.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 팍스 보안 위원회의 승인을 받으면 법률이 될 거야.

segments.text: Your friends and you will enjoy more autonomy, and a life with even fewer restrictions.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 당신과 당신의 친구들은 더 많은 자율성을 누리게 될 것이고, 지금보다 훨씬 적은 제약이 있는 삶을 살게 될 거야.

segments.text: You will also have a more respectable status in the Foundation.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 재단에서도 더 존경받는 지위를 갖게 될 거야.

segments.text: Ms. Z will fill you in with more details.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: Z씨가 자세한 내용을 알려드릴 겁니다.

segments.text: Thank you for telling me this.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 제게 소식을 알려주셔서 감사합니다.

segments.text: Lilya, who has been quiet by their side the whole time, suddenly speaks up.
segments.translation: 지금까지 그들 곁에서 조용히 있던 릴리야가 갑자기 입을 열었다.

segments.text: What about the treatment?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 치료는 어떻게 할 거야?

segments.text: Treatment?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 치료?

segments.text: Didn't it finish just now?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 방금 끝나지 않았나?

segments.text: This treatment has an investigative purpose, and the Timekeeper has passed the examination as a safe, low-risk individual. As Ms. Z has said, Ms. Vertin is strong enough to be the Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이 치료는 조사 목적이고, 타임키퍼는 안전하고 위험도가 낮은 개인으로 검사를 통과했습니다. Z씨가 말했듯이, 버틴씨는 타임키퍼가 될 만큼 충분히 강합니다.

segments.text: However, you will receive punishments for the damage to public property. I suggest you heed it as a warning.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 하지만 공공재물 파손에 대한 처벌은 받게 될 거야. 이번 일을 경고로 받아들이길 권하지.

segments.text: Constantine waves to the crowd. The rest of them are about to leave.
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴이 손을 흔들자 나머지 사람들 또한 떠날 채비를 했다.

segments.text: We should say our goodbye. Please rest well.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이제 작별을 고해야겠군. 푹 쉬게.

segments.text: She suddenly notices the white dove on the tree and stops.
segments.translation: 그녀는 나무 위의 흰 비둘기를 발견하더니 갑자기 멈춰 선다.

segments.text: Hmm, seems like the dove of the white marble house is paying you a visit.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 흠, 하얀 대리석 저택의 비둘기가 당신을 찾아오는 것 같군요.

segments.text: What do you mean?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그게 무슨 뜻이죠?

segments.text: Heh heh ... Nothing peculiar.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 헤헤... 별일 없어.

segments.text: It just means you have come to their notice.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그냥 네가 그들의 눈에 띄었다는 뜻이야.

segments.text: This is the end. Everything has been settled.
segments.translation: 모든 게 끝이 났다. 모든 것이 정리되었다.

segments.text: Time flows by like water flows over a perfectly flat plain.
segments.translation: 시간이 완전히 평평한 평원 위로 흐르는 물처럼 흘러간다.

segments.text: Yes. That's right. En, I got it.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 맞아, 바로 그거야. 응. 알겠네.

segments.text: I'll reply tomorrow.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 내일 답해주겠네.

segments.text: Madam Z returns to her office as usual.
segments.translation: Z는 여느 때와 마찬가지로 본인 사무실로 돌아간다.

segments.text: But this time, the secretary, who always fully engages in the daily agenda, looks up to her.
segments.translation: 하지만 이번에는 평소 일일 업무에 완전히 몰두하던 비서가 그녀를 올려다보았다.

segments.text: Please wait, Madam Z.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 잠깐만요, Z 부인.

segments.text: She passes her a box.
segments.translation: 그녀가 상자를 건넸다.

segments.text: Madam Constantine asked me to give this to you.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴 부인께서 이걸 전해드리라고 하셨습니다.

segments.text: Did she say why?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 무슨 용건 때문인지 말씀하셨어?

segments.text: No, she didn't explain it.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 아니요, 그녀는 설명하지 않았어요.

segments.text: Sharon quickly goes through her head.
segments.translation: 샤론은 머릿속을 빠르게 정리했다.

segments.text: Wait, I think she mentioned ... it's September 11 in the Chinese calendar today.
segments.speaker: Secretary Sharon
segments.translation: 잠깐, 그녀가 말했던 게... 오늘이 음력 9월 11일이라고 했던 것 같은데.

segments.text: I see. Please send my thanks to her.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 알겠어. 나 대신 고맙다고 전해줘.

segments.text: Sharon nods and quietly returns to her seat.
segments.translation: 샤론은 고개를 끄덕이더니 본인이 업무를 보던 곳으로 조용히 돌아간다.

segments.text: Madam Z looks at the box.
segments.translation: Z가 상자를 바라본다.

segments.text: A faint smell of red sandalwood wafts in the air.
segments.translation: 은은한 자단의 향기가 공기 중을 떠다녔다.

segments.text: A set of brand new Go.
segments.translation: 깨끗한 바둑 한 세트였다.

segments.text: A gift card is attached.
segments.translation: 선물 카드가 동봉되어 있다.

segments.text: "I'm glad to witness your progress."
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 당신의 성장을 지켜볼 수 있어서 기쁘군요.

segments.text: Madam Z closes the box calmly and puts it into her pocket.
segments.translation: Z는 차분하게 상자를 닫더니 호주머니에 집어넣었다.

segments.text: She opens the door and walks into her office.
segments.translation: 그녀는 문을 열고 사무실로 들어간다.

segments.text: She looks around.
segments.translation: 그녀는 주변을 둘러봤다.

segments.text: This is just an ordinary room. Normal, but practical.
segments.translation: 평범하면서도 적당한 공간이었다.

segments.text: There are regulation documents, academic journals, and calendars and agendas. An old photo is placed next to the mirror.
segments.translation: 규정 문서들과 학술지, 달력과 일정표들이 있다. 거울 옆에는 오래된 사진 한 장이 놓여 있다.

segments.text: She sees herself in that mirror.
segments.translation: 그녀는 거울 속 자기 얼굴을 보았다.

segments.text: The face in the mirror is a lot more mature than the young girl in that old photo.
segments.translation: 지금 거울에 비친 사람은 흑백 사진 속 소녀보다 윤곽이 더 또렷했다.

segments.text: ... Will a doe become a tigress?
segments.translation: ...흰 사슴이 사나운 호랑이가 될 수 있을까?

segments.text: She runs her hand through her hair.
segments.translation: 그녀는 머리를 쓸어 넘겼다.

segments.text: It doesn't seem too long ago when she still had a braid to her shoulder.
segments.translation: 땋은 머리가 어깨까지 내려왔던 날들이 아직도 눈앞에 선했다.

segments.text: She combs her hair and splits it into three strands.
segments.translation: 그녀는 머리를 빗어 세 갈래로 나눴다.

segments.text: Lay the leftmost strand on top of the rightmost, go across, then the right goes on top of the left, cross, and tie it up.
segments.translation: 맨 왼쪽 가닥을 맨 오른쪽 위에 올리고, 교차시킨 다음, 오른쪽을 왼쪽 위에 올려서 교차시키고 묶는다.

segments.text: The braid bristles, like an awkward sheep tail.
segments.translation: 땋은 머리가 위로 삐쳤는데, 마치 양 꼬리 같은 모습이었다.

segments.text: Heh heh ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 헤헤...

segments.text: She opens the refrigerator and takes out a plain cake under the cold light.
segments.translation: 그녀는 냉장고를 열고 차가운 조명 아래서 평범한 케이크를 꺼낸다.

segments.text: With a tight pull, the lamp turns off.
segments.translation: 줄을 세게 당기자 조명이 꺼졌다.

segments.text: The room quiets down again.
segments.translation: 방 안에 다시 적막이 감돌았다.

segments.text: Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you.
segments.translation: 생일 축하합니다, 생일 축하합니다.

segments.text: May the good luck go with you. Happy birthday to you.
segments.translation: 행운이 함께하길. 생일을 축하한다.

segments.text: *blows out the candle*
segments.translation: 촛불을 불어 껐다.
